cookie.text: By clicking Accept, you consent to our use of cookies.

content.title: Content
content.description: This application has been developed using <blue>React</blue> technology in combination with <blue>TypeScript</blue>. Its main purpose is to fetch data from an external <blue>API</blue> using the <blue>React Query</blue> library, and then render a portion of that data in this tab. To ensure the quality and reliability of the application, I have implemented tests using the <blue>React Testing Library</blue>. The visual appearance of the application has been implemented using the <blue>Styled Components</blue> library. Additionally, the application's theme state is managed using the <blue>Recoil</blue> library, and it also offers the option to choose a language.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions, please write to me.
contact.sent: Your message has been sent successfully
